name.ja: <ruby>帝<rt>てい</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>機<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>才<rt>さい</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal Summons a monster while you have a face-up Level 5 or higher monster with 1000 DEF on your field.

effect.en: Change that Normal Summoned monster to face-down Defense Position. Then, you can add 1 Level 5 or higher monster with 1000 DEF from your Graveyard to your hand.
